DOC.brief_summary: To develope nerve sparing radical hysterectomy for treatment of cervical cancer to minimize the complication of radical hysterectomy and to maximize quality of life and to evaluate the feasibility and efficacy by prospective randomized trial.
DOC.brief_title: The Efficacy and Safety of Nerve-sparing Radical Hysterectomy in Cervical Cancer
